titles: To the right honourable James Earl of Perth, Lord Drummond, and Stob-hall, &c. Lord High Chancellour of his Majesties most ancient kingdom of Scotland. The congratulatory welcome of an obliged quill.
author: Murray, Mungo, 17th cent.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
